products.title: 3 Seater Double Sofa Bed Keva Genoa Blue

description.short: Do you have any doubts that a piece of furniture like the Genoa Sofa bed is capable of giving a new look to your space?
description.long: Do you have any doubts that a piece of furniture like the Genoa Sofa bed is capable of giving a new look to your space? Whether in the Living room, in the office or in the Bedroom, it adapts very well to your needs and also adds a charming touch to the environment. The cozy structure combined with the stick feet is great for sitting, watching TV, reading a book or relaxing on a daily basis. But if you need to take a nap or have visitors at home, just open the zippers that hold the feet to transform it into a bed. Show, right? Oh, it even has this beautiful blue color to be the finishing touch to the decoration.

products.title: 3 Seater Double Seats Premium Sofa Bed Suede Gray

description.short: The Sofa bed Premium will renew your restful days
description.long: With a look that promises to bring sophistication and warmth to your home, the Sofa bed Premium will renew your days of rest, as well as being a piece worthy of praise in any decor. Inside, it has reforestation wood in its composition, a great feature for daily use. On the outside, suede makes everyone want to stay in it without having to go out, as well as enhancing your leisure time in front of the television. Ah, to top it all off, it quickly transforms from a sofa to a bed to adapt to your routine and needs. Many benefits for a home that deserves to be equally incredible ;)

products.title: 3 Seater Double Corsica Sofa Bed Dark Gray

description.short: A simple piece of furniture like the Corsica Sofa bed has the ability to revamp your space
description.long: A simple piece of furniture like the Corsica Sofa bed has the ability to revamp your space, regardless of where you choose to place it. Combining an elegant structure with stick legs, it is suitable for those leisure moments in front of the television or reading a book, as well as for accommodating your guests who will spend the night at your home. To do this, just open the zippers that hold the feet to transform it into a bed. Too much, right? Ah, the gray color and the covering details only add more charm to your home style.

products.title: 3 Seater Double Venice Sofa Bed Yellow

description.short: The Venice Sofa bed is also a great ally for decorating rooms!
description.long: A practical way to increase the receptivity of the home, the Venice Sofa bed is also a great ally for decorating rooms! Welcome from the living room to the office, it has a design with simple lines and slightly angled feet, not to mention the striking color that is perfect for composing the space and making it the star of the room - oh, the stitched finish of the seat and back is another elegant highlight worth mentioning. To bring comfort to your routine or welcome friends over the weekend, it accompanies that movie or chat session when in its original position and, with small changes to the structure, it becomes an extra bed for guests who stay extra. All this usability will make your home a safe haven where you can relax and recharge for the next day - features that everyone wants, right?

products.title: Retractable Sofa Without Box 3 seats Solomons Linen Beige

description.short: Solomons Retractable Sofa without Box has everything to make your home more comfortable.
description.long: Cozy and welcoming, the Solomons Boxless Retractable Sofa has everything to make your home more comfortable. Structured in resistant materials, it has a seat and back with foam padding and loose silicone feather cushions, providing great well-being and comfort to whoever is using it. In addition to being cozy and also transforming into a sofa bed, the furniture is ideal for smaller environments, as it is the type without a box, which optimizes the space available in the room and frees up more circulation area. All of this is finished off with a clean and elegant design that highlights the timeless color and will certainly leave your space impeccable, worthy of lots of compliments.

products.title: 3 Seater Retractable and Reclining Sofa Lupine Cream Linen

description.short: Lupine sofa is the best combination of comfort and beauty
description.long: With countless structural advantages and an eye-catching design, the Lupine Sofa is the best combination of comfort and beauty. The first highlight is the casters, which make the piece easily adaptable to the space and make reorganizing the Living room a simple task. The combination of foam with great density + retractable seat and reclining back offers the perfect balance for those moments when you need a more complete rest or when you are receiving visitors. With an elegant look that integrates harmoniously with the room's decor, it is also reinforced by the solid wood structure, which adds good durability and perfect security to the routine - this way, you can always count on a cozy and well-furnished corner to spend spend relaxing moments.

products.title: Belgrade 3 Seater Sofa with Right Chaise Gray Linen 230 cm

description.short: Welcome with warmth and good taste
description.long: Receiving with warmth and good taste will be an easy task with the presence of the Belgrade Sofa in your home! Structured in reforested eucalyptus wood, it has elastic straps and springs in the composition, which guarantees a firmer and more pleasant piece to use. On the outside, the furniture is covered in linen, a material that adds aesthetic value to its decoration. Ah, we can't help but comment on the chaise, this part of the sofa that has the greatest depth and is perfect for moments of stretching your legs and relaxing. Only benefits for your sweet home, right? ;)

description.short: To promote comfort and well-being in your favorite corners
description.long: To promote comfort and well-being in your favorite corners, count on the pillows that hug the body and the soft suede that only the Blenda Sofa can offer. Thanks to the rectilinear design and timeless color, it is perfect for bringing the missing charm to your home-style while accommodating family and friends for that pleasant conversation in the late afternoon or movie session on the weekend. To improve, it also has a retractable seat, which helps provide greater relaxation, and a reclining backrest that makes that after-lunch nap much more comfortable.
